abstract: After a tape of President Trump talking about the ambassador to Ukraine emerged, the secretary of state lashed out at a reporter’s question.
lead_paragraph: The trial resumes at 10 a.m., and it’s the White House’s turn to make opening arguments. Mr. Trump’s legal team said that they only planned to use a few hours of their allotted time to give a brief overview of its case.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
